allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Agent Kanban - Multi-agent monitoring dashboard

Features:
- Kanban board with 5 status columns \(Idle, Working, Waiting, Completed, Error\)
- Real-time WebSocket updates via Socket.io
- Agent hierarchy tree view for sub-agent visualization
- Search and filtering capabilities
- Dark mode support with theme persistence
- Statistics dashboard
- Toast notifications
- Keyboard shortcuts \(T, S, /, Ctrl+D, Escape\)
- Claude Code hooks integration for automatic status reporting
- Reporter CLI for custom integrations

Tech Stack:
- Frontend: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS + Zustand
- Backend: Node.js + Express + Socket.io
- Reporter/Hooks: Node.js + Socket.io-client

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
